title: Eligibility
description: Applicants must be registered farmers with a verified profile and valid identification.

title: Use of Funds
description: Loans must be used strictly for agricultural purposes, including but not limited to equipment purchase, farm input, labor, and expansion.

title: Repayment Terms
description: Repayments must be made according to the agreed schedule. Failure to repay on time may result in penalties or disqualification from future funding.

title: Interest Rates
description: All loans are subject to a fixed or variable interest rate, clearly stated before loan approval.

title: Loan Approval
description: Approval is based on creditworthiness, farming history, and availability of funds. Submission of an application does not guarantee approval.

title: Monitoring & Reporting
description: FoodBank reserves the right to monitor fund usage. Beneficiaries may be required to submit periodic reports or proof of farm activity.

title: Default Policy
description: In the event of a default, FoodBank may initiate recovery procedures, including legal action or fund deductions from future earnings.

title: Data Privacy
description: All information provided will be handled in accordance with our privacy policy and used solely for assessing and managing the loan process.

title: Amendments
description: FoodBank reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Notice will be given before changes take effect.

title: Agreement
description: By submitting a loan application, you agree to these terms and confirm that all information provided is accurate and truthful.
